parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> The mission is launched (from the main menu). Both campaign and mission are given as their directory name. If the campaign is empty, a single mission is launched. If skipBriefing is true, the intro and briefing are skipped. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''playMission''' [campaign, mission, skipBriefing] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> campaign: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mission: [[String]] or [[Config]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> skipBriefing (optional): [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>'''playMission''' ["XOutrage","x05Negotiator.Noe"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>'''playMission''' ["", configFile >> "CfgMissions" >> "Missions" >> "Armory1"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>'''playMission''' ["","\A3\Missions_F_Bootcamp\Scenarios\Arsenal.VR"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[hostMission]], [[playScriptedMission]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
